sentences.en: He had been behaving very meanly to his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 他对女朋友一直非常刻薄。

sentences.en: He had been going out with his girlfriend for seven months.
sentences.cn: 他同女朋友已经交往7个月了。

sentences.en: He had earlier rowed with his girlfriend.
He received a long-distance phone call from his girlfriend in Colorado.
sentences.cn: 他接到女朋友从科罗拉多打来的长途电话。

sentences.en: He was seen canoodling with his new girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 有人看到他和新女友在一起亲热。

sentences.en: He's constantly on the phone to his girlfriend being soppy.
sentences.cn: 他总是卿卿我我地跟女朋友煲电话粥。
他从来没有交过女朋友。

sentences.en: His girlfriend had gone into the witness box and taken the oath.
sentences.cn: 他的女朋友进入证人席并立了誓。

sentences.en: His previous girlfriend was a dancer with the Royal Ballet.
sentences.cn: 他的前女友是皇家芭蕾舞团的舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: I didn’t have a steady girlfriend (= one you have a long relationship with ) .
sentences.cn: 我那时没有固定的女友。

sentences.en: I met a girlfriend for lunch.
sentences.cn: 我同一位女友共进了午餐。

sentences.en: My girlfriend had broken up with me.
sentences.cn: 我的女朋友已跟我分手了。

sentences.en: My girlfriend is a saint to put up with me.
sentences.cn: 能够忍受我，我的女朋友真的很有耐心。

sentences.en: My girlfriend Lynn and I eloped.
My girlfriend nagged me to cut my hair.
sentences.cn: 我女朋友老是念叨着让我去理发。

sentences.en: She tortured herself with fantasies of Bob and his new girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 她想象着鲍勃和他的新女友在一起的情形，心里备受煎熬。

sentences.en: Your girlfriend's fear seems to interlock with your fear.
sentences.cn: 你女朋友的恐惧似乎与你的恐惧有密切关联。

trans.tran_en: a girl or woman that you are having a romantic relationship with
